title: Clarksdale, Mississippi. The local police force pose for a photograph as ministers from the National Council of Churches march to the local church.
marks: \"#20\", in pencil, on back; \"Printer/Kelton/BLEAK B \"Danny Lyon\", in pencil, on back
description: six men in a circle, with car at right; man in uniform in front, smoking a cigar, grabs his crotch; uniformed man in sunglasses behind first man extends the middle finger of his PR hand
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
